snippet: Simona Halep has won 57 matches since May and will become the first Romanian player, male or female, to claim a top-five ranking since the mid-1970s.
abstract: Light footwork, defensive speed and offensive power have earned tennis's Simona Halep 57 victories since May 2013, catapulting her up the women's rankings; Halep will become first Romanian, male or female, to claim a top-five ranking since the mid-1970s.
lead_paragraph: Simona Halep has won 57 matches since May and will become the first Romanian player, male or female, to claim a top-five ranking since the mid-1970s.

headline.seo: Simona Halep Nabs Romania’s First Top-5 WTA Ranking
headline.main: Newfound Assertiveness Sends Romanian Toward Top of Rankings
headline.print_headline: Newfound Assertiveness Sends Romanian Toward Top of Rankings
